Replace.Text: I agree with this friendship
It's not easy to make the choice, but rejection is the best option right now
You and I have similar visions and like-minded people, don’t we?
If you encounter any difficulties in the future, just tell me.
Good
Is there no rest in the fighting?
Do nothing, do everything
I have already arranged for your messenger, please rest assured
With all due respect, we have more important things to do in Sifangyuan right now and don't have time to deal with these issues.
These are some tea leaves, utensils and seasonal vegetables that I brought from Xuheng. I hope you can accept them.
Useless work
I'm not going to stop you from doing anything, but your recent behavior is abominable.
Sifangyuan, Gengchen, what’s the matter?
Please follow me, there are many places worth appreciating in Xuheng
Well, thank you for your invitation.
If you don't mind, please mark your location on the map, and I will tell you our location.
The mob should not be so rampant
If you don't have this intention, please withdraw your troops immediately.
Can you restrain your expansion behavior?
Nothing to say
If you are interested in Sifangyuan, why don't you come to me directly?
Small-minded behavior
We have our own beliefs, please don't bother us anymore.
Just let it be
This life mission is far from complete...
Well, thank you for your cooperation
Well, thank you for your cooperation
Well, thank you for your cooperation
No problem
No problem
No problem
If your people have no wealth, no matter how great your buildings are, they cannot hide your decline.
Gengchen hates the numerous wonders in your city
Amagasaki Sacred Grounds - Taichi
Divine Realm Tianyuan
Gengchen
If you encounter any difficulties, just tell me
Great Wilderness Flowing Marsh

Immediately gain Zhiming and Gengchen after creating a capital, and each time your civilization enters a new era, buildings constructed in the Plasma Landmark area gain +5% [ICON_Production] productivity. When not owning a Plasma Landmark area, all cities gain +3 [ICON_Faith] Faith. When owning a Plasma Landmark area, but not all landmark buildings of the same era, builder purchase [ICON_Gold] costs -33%. When owning all {LOC_ERA_CLASSICAL_NAME} landmark buildings, but not all landmark buildings of a higher era, all cities gain +100% [ICON_Gold]. When owning all {LOC_ERA_RENAISSANCE_NAME} landmark buildings, but not all landmark buildings of a higher era, your cities can now produce Heavy Melee Modifiers, and all cities gain +35% [ICON_Production] productivity. When owning all {LOC_ERA_MODERN_NAME} landmark buildings, all cities gain +30% [ICON_Science] science value.

Time will not change our essence. Regardless of our ability or knowledge, we are always exploring the meaning of the existence of everything... The answer we recognize at this moment is probably still an iceberg on the sea. - Geng Chen
pragmatism
I hate civilizations with too many wonders.
